## Print Integers

The following codes show how to print from **1 to 10**.

```{r}
print(1)
print(2)
print(3)
print(4)
print(5)
print(6)
print(7)
print(8)
print(9)
print(10)
```

## Smarter Print

The codes below use a smarter print to print **1 to 10** using **for..loop**. 

```{r}
for (i in 1:10) { 
  print(i)
}
```
